text: Mootichis guyyuma sana iddoo walakkaa oobdii fuula mana qulqullummaa Waaqayyoo dura jiru sanaa Waaqaaf addaan ni baasee aarsaa gubamu, kennaa midhaanii fi aarsaa nagaa achitti dhi ºeesse; kunis sababii iddoon aarsaa kan naasii irraa hojjetamee fuula Waaqayyoo dura jiru sun aarsaa gubamu, kennaa midhaanii fi cooma aarsaa nagaa baachuu hin dandeenyeef.
